message.name: ERR_MISSING_MANDATORY_LOCATION_NAME
message.locale: The destination name ('location' parameter) is mandatory and must be provided.

message.name: ERR_MISSING_MANDATORY_EVIDENCE_TYPE_NAME
message.locale: Logical Name ('evidenceType' parameter) is mandatory and must be provided.

message.name: ERR_MISSING_MANDATORY_EFFECTIVE_DATE_NAME
message.locale: Effective Date ('effectiveDate' parameter) is mandatory and must be provided.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_DOWNLOAD_DIRECTORY
message.locale: %1s is not a valid location. Please specify a valid location.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_UPLOAD_FILE
message.locale: '%1s' is not a valid File. Please specify a valid Dynamic Evidence Metadata file.

message.name: INF_NO_EVIDENCE_TYPE_ON_SYSTEM
message.locale: Dynamic Evidence Type with logical name '%1s' not found.

message.name: INF_NO_EFFECTIVE_DATE_ON_SYSTEM
message.locale: Dynamic Evidence with Effective Date '%1s' not found.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_EFFECTIVE_DATE
message.locale: Effective Date must be in the format of 'YYYYMMDD'.Please provide a valid effective date.

message.name: ERR_DOWNLOAD_EVIDENCE_TYPE_VERSION_MULTIPLE_CANCELED
message.locale: More than one Canceled Dynamic Evidence Type Versions found for the same effective date '%1s'.Cannot Download Metadata.

message.name: INF_BEGIN_DOWNLOAD_ACTIVITY
message.locale: Download process started.

message.name: ERR_DOWNLOAD_INTERRUPTED
message.locale: An error has occurred while downloading the Dynamic Evidence Metadata. Reason: %1s

message.name: INF_BEGIN_READING_METADATA_FROM_DATABASE
message.locale: Reading the Metadata contents from the Database.

message.name: INF_BEGIN_FINISHED_READING_METADATA_FROM_DATABASE
message.locale: Finished reading the Metadata contents from the Database.

message.name: INF_FINISHED_DOWNLOAD_ACTIVITY
message.locale: Finished Downloading Dynamic Evidence Metadata. Please view the Metadata at '%1s' .

message.name: INF_INEDIT_AND_ACTIVE_EXISTS
message.locale: '%1s' contains both In-Edit and Active versions. Downloading Only Active Version.

message.name: INF_INEDIT_AND_CANCEL_EXISTS
message.locale: '%1s' contains both In-Edit and Canceled versions. Downloading Only In-Edit Version.

message.name: INF_ACTIVE_AND_CANCEL_EXISTS
message.locale: '%1s' contains both Active and Canceled versions. Downloading Only Active Version.

message.name: INF_ONLY_CANCEL_EXISTS
message.locale: Only Canceled Version exists.Downloading the Canceled Version.

message.name: INF_SINGLE_VERSION_EXISTS
message.locale: Only one Version exists for the Effective Date '%1s'.

message.name: INF_BEGIN_UPLOAD_ACTIVITY
message.locale: Upload process started.

message.name: INF_BEGIN_READING_UPLOAD_METADATA
message.locale: Reading Metadata from %1s

message.name: INF_FINISHED_READING_UPLOAD_METADATA
message.locale: Finished Reading Metadata from %1s

message.name: INF_BEGIN_UPDATING_METADATA_IN_DATABASE
message.locale: Updating the Metadata contents in to the database.

message.name: INF_FINISHED_UPDATING_METADATA_IN_DATABASE
message.locale: Finished Updating the Metadata contents in to the database.

message.name: ERR_UPLOAD_INTERRUPTED
message.locale: An error has occurred while uploading the Dynamic Evidence Metadata. Reason: %1s

message.name: INF_FINISHED_UPLOAD_ACTIVITY
message.locale: Finished Uploading Metadata for the Dynamic Evidence '%1s' effective dated '%2s'.

message.name: INF_WRITING_METADATA_FILE
message.locale: Writing Dynamic Evidence Metadata from %1s.

message.name: ERR_LOADER_FAILED_REASON
message.locale: An error has occured while processing your request. Reason: '%1s'
